Troubled Waters

Ano: 2020

IMDb ID: tt12350830

Sinopse: Ron Waters was the hottest young comic in Hollywood in the early 90s, and a personal protégé of Richard Pryor. His political humor and his general realness made him one of a kind. His behavior as he climbed up the ladder caused such controversy that he had to leave Hollywood. Due to his honesty and modern take on life, Ron Waters is truly a classic. After a self-imposed exile, Ron is back.
